devdoc.details: SLORegistry is a contract for handling creation of service level objectives and querying those service level objectives

isRespected(uint256,address).details: external view function to check a value against the SLO

params._value: The SLI value to check against the SL

returns._0: boolean with the SLO honored state

registerSLO(uint256,uint8,address).details: public function for creating service level objectives
